title: (x) Looking to ID this 'Dollar' Font - Federal {Tomi}
content:
This should be easy for me, but I'm stumped. Can someone ID this font, mainly used on our dollar?

Thank you

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20121213165454im_/http:/typophile.com/files/FedType_5381.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [FedType.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20121213165454/http:/typophile.com/files/FedType.jpg) | 172.4 KB |
author: Mac_Ink

comments.content: You are exactly right! But I can't stand how they merge the serifs together (in the A for example)... Is not there a very, very similar font instead?
